name: Noggle Statue - Misery
description: A small wobbly statue of Stalker's Acolyte, Misery.

languages.description: Eine kleine Wackelfigur vom Akolythen des Stalkers, Elend.
languages.name: Noggle-Statue: Elend

languages.description: Une petite statue à tête oscillante de Misère, un des disciples du Stalker.
languages.name: Statuette Noggle - Misère

languages.description: Una statuetta del discepolo dello Stalker, Misery, con la testa tremolante.
languages.name: Statuetta Noggle - Misery

languages.description: 스토커의 어콜라이트, 미저리의 갸웃거리는 작은 인형입니다.
languages.name: 노글 스태츄 - 미저리

languages.description: Una pequeña y tambaleante estatua de uno de los discípulos de Stalker, Miseria.
languages.name: Estatua Tambaleante - Miseria

languages.description: 一小座追猎者追随者苦难摇头娃娃
languages.name: 苦难摇头娃娃

languages.description: Stalkerの従者のボブルヘッド人形、Misery。
languages.name: Misery ボブルヘッド

languages.description: Mała, chwiejna figurka akolity Stalkera: Udręka.
languages.name: Figurka Noggle — Udręka

languages.description: Uma estatueta articulada de um discípulo do Stalker, Miséria.
languages.name: Estatueta: Miséria

languages.description: 一小座 Stalker 的追隨者－苦難的搖頭娃娃。
languages.name: 苦難搖頭娃娃

languages.description: รูปปั้นตุ๊กตาหัวโยกขนาดเล็กของผู้ช่วยเหลือ Stalker - Misery
languages.name: รูปปั้น Noggle - Misery

languages.description: Stalker Acolyte, Misery küçük oynar figür.
languages.name: Noggle Heykeli - Misery

languages.description: Статуетка прибічника Сталкера на ім’я Страждання.
languages.name: Ноґл «Страждання»
